thread.title: Ground News - Photos show how terrible New York City's grocery stores are compared to the Midwest
thread.title_full: Ground News - Photos show how terrible New York City's grocery stores are compared to the Midwest

author: Business Insider
title: Ground News - Photos show how terrible New York City's grocery stores are compared to the Midwest
text:
Summary by Business Insider At Meijer.Talia Lakritz/Business InsiderNew York City grocery stores are about half the size of the average US supermarket.As a Midwesterner living in NYC, I miss shopping for groceries in giant superstores.Photos show how NYC grocery stores pale in comparison to Midwestern ones.When I lived in the Midwest, I looked forward to grocery shopping. Browsing spacious stores with seemingly endless aisles of products to try felt like an enjoyable outin… Share menu More
